item.title: Harville Chapter 1
item.author: revans.evans@gmail.com (Rich Evans)
item.description: Intro Iâ€™ve come across countless blogs (Detroit data lab, Data Science +, many others) attempting to cover the breadth of linear algebra using R, but each and every one of them peters out after some time. In this blog I would like to change that by exhausting myself, with the help of TV and others, to provide a complete treatment of Matrix Algebra for Statistics. Additionally, since many other blogs have tackled the basics, I will be skipping most of the theory and computation of the 1st chapter of Harville, opting instead to list a few important concepts to carry forward.
